full_summary:
**THS Special Advisor and Project Administrator for IRB**
```markdown
### Solicitation Details

#### Solicitation Number
*20231515-IRB*

#### Amendment Number
*4*

#### Publication Date
*2023-11-24*

#### Closing Date
*2023-12-01 14:00:00*

#### Expected Contract Start Date
*2023-12-11*

#### Expected Contract End Date
*2024-11-04*
```
THIS PROCUREMENT IS CLOSED.

Under the Category of Temporary Help Services, the Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada (IRB) requires Special Advisor and Project Administrator services under the Office Support (Stream 1) and Policy and Advisory (Stream 13) categories. The proposed contract will be established for a period of approximately 240 days.

### Eligibility

This procurement is open to suppliers who have a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) in the THS category and have been pre-qualified under the respective categories of:

#### Office Support (Stream 1)
* 1.17 Project Administrator (Senior)

#### Policy and Advisory (Stream 13)
* 13.9 Special Advisor (Senior)

Suppliers must have access to a reliable and qualified pool of resources to fulfill this requirement.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the provisions of the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-United States-Mexico Agreement (CUSMA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

### Contact
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact:

* Christina Madhu
* Phone: 343-572-7851
* Email: christina.madhu@irb-cisr.gc.ca

### Attachments
Please refer to the attachment for the full solicitation document.

Note: This procurement is closed as per the notice below. 

Nonetheless, I did format your response according to your request. I also removed the redundant information for English and French, so if needed please contact me to revert back the original text. Let me know if you have any further requests.  I'm here to help
